comments.body: Could we add test for this?
Sure, I can try.  Any tips where/how?

Some potential places to get hints from:

- https://github.com/sbt/zinc/blob/develop/internal/zinc-apiinfo/src/test/scala/xsbt/api/HashAPISpecification.scala
- https://github.com/sbt/zinc/blob/develop/internal/zinc-apiinfo/src/test/scala/sbt/internal/inc/ClassToAPISpecification.scala
- https://github.com/sbt/zinc/blob/develop/zinc/src/sbt-test/apiinfo/unstable-existential-names/test

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +250,254 @@    hashType(c.selfType)
    if (includeSealedChildren)
      hashTypesSymmetric(c.childrenOfSealedClass, includeDefinitions)

    val isTrait = c.definitionType() == DefinitionType.Trait
